references.paper_title: Physics-informed neural networks: A deep learning framework for solving forward and inverse problems involving nonlinear partial differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concept of Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), a crucial method utilized and extended in the current research.

references.paper_title: Deeponet: Learning nonlinear operators for identifying differential equations based on the universal approximation theorem of operators
references.reason: This work details DeepONet, a neural operator architecture that forms the basis of the network design in the current study.

references.paper_title: Fourier Neural Operator for Parametric Partial Differential Equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the Fourier Neural Operator (FNO), a highly efficient and accurate method for solving PDEs, which is conceptually related to the approach presented in the current work.
This paper introduces Physics-Informed Neural Operators (PINO), which directly addresses the challenges of applying neural networks to solve nonlinear PDEs.

references.paper_title: DeepONet for solving PDEs: Generalization analysis in Sobolev training
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical analysis of DeepONet's generalization capabilities when used for solving PDEs, directly supporting the theoretical framework of the current work.
